general.name: LifeLifting
general.slogan: We are not afraid of mirrors!

errors.too_much_chars: Too much characters, slow down there..

login.title: Welcome Back
login.intro: Login to your account to access your personal plans and goals.

forgot_password.title: Forgot Password
forgot_password.intro: Fill out your email, so we can send you the password reset instructions.
forgot_password.thanks_text: Thank you! We've sent you an email. Please follow the steps in the mail.

buttons.new_account: Sign up for a new account instead

password_reset.title: Reset your password
password_reset.intro: Welcome back! Please enter a new password and don't forget again. üôèüèº
password_reset.intro_forbidden: Hey! üëÄ Either you didn't request this, or you've waited too long.

signup.title: Hey There! üëãüèº
signup.intro: Create an account to see your schedules and goals, chat with your nutritionist and get real-time data.

step_success.title: Account created!
step_success.intro: Please complete the following steps to use the LifeLifting Mirror.

step_one.title: Step 1: Basic personal data
step_one.intro: Psst, you already filled out the basic data. If you made a mistake, don't worry. You can edit your whole profile after signing up. Click the button to go to the next step!

form.hear_from_us_label: How did you hear from us?

limbo.past_due_date: Did the specialist forget to accept/cancel it and it's past due date?

step_done.title: Cheers to planning that in! üçª
step_done.intro: Congrats on looking for a better version of yourself. Thank you for your trust in LifeLifting Nutrition.
step_done.will_confirm: will confirm your consultation as soon as possible.

not_accepted.title: Oh.. Appointment not accepted!
not_accepted.subtitle_1: The specialist couldn't fit your request in his schedule. Please contact

appointment_status.title: Appointment status
appointment_status.subtitle_1: If you see your appointment down here. Congrats! Then it has been accepted. If not, please wait untill the specialist accepts your request. Is it taking a long time? Please contact
appointment_status.subtitle_2: if you have any trouble, or for any further questions.

completed_appointment.title: Nice, you completed your first appointment!
completed_appointment.subtitle_1: But your payment hasn't been processed yet. Make sure you've paid. Don't hesitate contacting
completed_appointment.subtitle_2: if you have any trouble with your payment, or for any further questions.

subscription_ended.title: Aww.. Your subscription has ended
subscription_ended.subtitle_1: We hope you had an awesome growth in your time with LifeLifting. And you're always welcome to train with

all_completed.title: Looks like everything is ok!
all_completed.subtitle: You've completed all the steps. Click the button below to continue to the dashboard.

users.title: The Users of LifeLifting
users.intro: In this section you have a quick overview of the users. You can view quick contact info and edit/delete them directly from the list. With the top right button you add one. üòÉ

list_item.tooltip: User hasn't completed the Signup process yet

shopping_list.title: Shopping list
shopping_list.intro_1: This shopping list is for mealplan
shopping_list.intro_2: You can print this shopping list by clicking on the button in the top right corner or you can open it on your phone and cross off the items while you're in the supermarket.
